style_check.pass: Well done, no code style issues were detected!
style_check.fail:
It is important to pay careful attention to code style. Suggestions on how to re-format your code are shown below.

A | indicates a line that requires re-formatting, < indicates a line that could be deleted.

general: Additionally, you should check that you've used sensible and descriptive function names. This will help to make your code more readable and self-documenting.
